headline: Solar stocks surge after Senate Republicans hint at tax credit changes
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of major solar energy companies surged Tuesday after a key Republican senator indicated lawmakers are discussing changes to provisions that would end tax credits for rooftop solar panels in President Donald Trump’s spending bill.

headline: Enphase Energy (ENPH) Nosedives 21.38% W/W on Tax Credit Phase-Out
summary: Enphase Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENPH) is one of the Massive Sell-Offs: These 10 Stocks Shockingly Nosedived. Enphase Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENPH) fell by 21.38 percent week-on-week to end Friday’s trading at $35.85 versus the $45.6 on June 13, as investors sold off positions amid proposals to phase out solar and wind tax credits by 2028. Enphase Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENPH) […]
